Insert a standardized Preceptor or Population Table template

Source: R/make_p_tables.R
make_p_tables.Rd

Insert editable templates for Preceptor and Population tables.

Usage

make_p_tables(
  is_causal = TRUE,
  unit_label = "Unit",
  outcome_label = if (is_causal) "Potential Outcomes" else "Outcome",
  treatment_label = "Treatment",
  covariate_label = "Covariates",
  pre_time = "2020"
)

Arguments

is_causal

Logical. If TRUE, generates template for causal analysis; else predictive.

unit_label

Label (character) for the Unit spanner

outcome_label

Label (character) for the Outcome or Potential Outcomes spanner

treatment_label

Label (character) for the Treatment spanner (only used if is_causal = TRUE)

covariate_label

Label (character) for the Covariates spanner

Details

This function creates a five-chunk Quarto-ready template for Preceptor and Population Tables. The output is inserted directly into the current document at the cursor.
